document_data.name: Laddie
document_data.mainbody: '''Laddie''' was an shepherd's [[dog]] that belonged to [[Ivrin]] of the [[Wild Pastures]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Unlike most other dogs, Laddie's sense of smell was quite inept on account of the hound's "frightful allergies."
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the Wild Pastures west of [[Liam's Hold]] hamlet began experiencing uncanny disappearances of cattle, sometimes in the middle of the day. Laddie and its master Ivrin the Shepherd witnessed one such disappearance firsthand. The shepherd's favorite cow [[Betty]] seemingly stopped existing after the observer duo heard strange giggling. [[Goblin]] tribe in service of the [[devil]] [[Gorgomorz]] armed with shaman brews of ''[[invisibility]]'' were to blame.
